column5: If you haven't already turned off and drained your outside hosebibs, its a good time to do so. This is the kind of weather that'll pop your pipes in no time! Happy holidays!
I got them done a few weeks ago, tks bro!
.... and if you forgot to pull the dust caps off your bearing buddies on the trailer and wipe out the (now) crystalized excess grease.. TOO LATE !!
O great thanks for taking away all of my easy money...Actually good advise and don't just turn off the water drain the valve and pipes and make sure the hose is not left connected.   Art

A timely reminder indeed. I'd been thinking about doing it for a few weeks now but the weather had allowed me to continue filling the bird bath every few days and of course I forgot.  Took care of it about 10 minutes ago, thank you.
